topic.title: HPE Helion Development Platform 2.0: Enable Container Deployment

body.p:
For security, Docker container deployments are disabled. You can enable container deployment in two ways:
Add sudo permissions to users within an organization
Disable sudo requirement for Docker apps

section.title: To Add sudo Permission for All Users

ol.li: Click a quota plan and then click Edit Quota.
Check the Allow Sudo checkbox and then click Update.
For the setting to take effect, restart any apps running under the quota plan.

section.title: To Remove sudo Requirement for Docker App Deployment

ol.li: Click Settings HPE Helion Development Platform Settings .
On the left panel, lick Docker Apps Settings.
